DescriptionData.Title: Amerikan Body Art Mica Shimmer Powder - Pixie Stix (1.06 oz/30 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Amerikan Body Art Mica Shimmer Powders are made from a group of natural occurring minerals. Mica powder is ground from Mica mineral and American Body Art adds it to cosmetic grade ingredients to create an opalescent effect.
You can use the powder on eyes, face or body. The small particles in the mica powder make it perfect for small spaces and fine details--they stick better than ordinary glitter. The small mica particles also pick up light and sparkle easily for dazzling results.
Comes in a 30 gram container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made of finely ground natural minerals
Mica powder creates an iridescent and opalescent effect
Perfect for small details and small spaces like eyelids
